Container.Name: Newt
Container.Overview:
Newt (https://github.com/fosrl/newt) is the tunneled site & network connector for Pangolin (https://github.com/fosrl/pangolin), the identity-based remote access platform.
Chat with us on Discord!
https://discord.gg/HCJR8Xhme4
Container.Category: Security: Tools: Network:Web Network:Proxy Network:VPN Network:Privacy

Config.Name: PANGOLIN_ENDPOINT
Config.Description: This is the full URL of the Pangolin instance. Example: https://proxy.example.com

Config.Name: NEWT_ID
Config.Description: This is the unique ID of the Newt site. Example: 31frd0uzbjvp721

Config.Name: NEWT_SECRET
Config.Description: This is the secret key of the Newt site. Example: h51mmlknrvrwv8s4r1i210azhumt6isgbpyavxodibx1k2d6
